# Провайдер beget

## Пример использования


//TODO KZ обновить пример
```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    beget = {
      source = "registry.terraform.io/beget/beget"
    }
  }
}

provider "beget" {
  token = var.beget_token
}

resource "beget_ssh_key" "main_key" {
  name       = "zhuykovkb@gmail.com"
  public_key = "ssh-ed25519 AAAAC3NzaC1lZDI1NTE5AAAAIOw9mSAEkEDdWJbFMyRYz78HhT4qeZtTJRTQjgsCBoFv zhuykovkb@gmail.com"
}

output "main_key" {
  description = "Main SSH key details"
  value = {
    id          = beget_ssh_key.main_key.id
    name        = beget_ssh_key.main_key.name
    fingerprint = beget_ssh_key.main_key.fingerprint
  }
}

resource "beget_ssh_key" "second_key" {
  name       = "debian222"
  public_key = "ssh-ed25519 AAAAC3NzaC1lZDI1NTE5AAAAIIpcs/NKKob9vE9sV6ieAxCmbt2G0ruFO7Ud3zCHh9f0 zhuykovkb@gmail.com"
}

output "second_key" {
  description = "Second SSH key details"
  value = {
    id          = beget_ssh_key.second_key.id
    name        = beget_ssh_key.second_key.name
    fingerprint = beget_ssh_key.second_key.fingerprint
  }
}

resource "beget_compute_snapshot" "snapshot-vps-1" {
  compute_instance_id = "8838e90e-5bfd-4cc5-9edc-550135c83800"
  description         = "snapshot via terraform 1 new name"
}

output "snapshot-vps-1" {
  description = "All fields of the created compute snapshot"
  value = {
    id                  = beget_compute_snapshot.snapshot-vps-1.id
    compute_instance_id = beget_compute_snapshot.snapshot-vps-1.compute_instance_id
    description         = beget_compute_snapshot.snapshot-vps-1.description
    status              = beget_compute_snapshot.snapshot-vps-1.status
    size                = beget_compute_snapshot.snapshot-vps-1.size
    date_create         = beget_compute_snapshot.snapshot-vps-1.date_create
    region              = beget_compute_snapshot.snapshot-vps-1.region
    vps_name            = beget_compute_snapshot.snapshot-vps-1.vps_name
    configuration = {
      cpu_count = beget_compute_snapshot.snapshot-vps-1.configuration.cpu_count
      ram_mb    = beget_compute_snapshot.snapshot-vps-1.configuration.ram_mb
      disk_mb   = beget_compute_snapshot.snapshot-vps-1.configuration.disk_mb
    }
  }
}

```

## Схема провайдера
<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `token` (String, Sensitive) Beget JWT API Token for API authentication

### Optional

- `default_create_timeout` (String) Default timeout for create operations. A string that can be parsed as a duration (e.g., '30s', '5m', '2h').
- `default_delete_timeout` (String) Default timeout for delete operations. A string that can be parsed as a duration (e.g., '30s', '5m', '2h').
- `default_read_timeout` (String) Default timeout for read operations. A string that can be parsed as a duration (e.g., '30s', '5m', '2h').
- `default_update_timeout` (String) Default timeout for update operations. A string that can be parsed as a duration (e.g., '30s', '5m', '2h').
